refnamediv.refpurpose: Name of cross reference targets data file

refsection.para: In order to resolve olinks efficiently, the stylesheets can generate an external data file containing information about all potential cross reference endpoints in a document. This parameter lets you change the name of the generated file from the default name target.db. The name must agree with that used in the target database used to resolve olinks during processing. See also target.database.document.
